body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1769)

comment_data.body: We could use this in the places where we write `tcp_c->tcp_connections_length` directly in the code?
We could. I'll open a separate PR for this.
This could be used in `tcp_connected_relays_count`. No need to use it everywhere, but at least in one function.
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,16 @@
+#include "tcp_connection.h"
+
+#include <gtest/gtest.h>
+
+namespace
+{
+
+// TODO(Jfreegman) make this useful or remove it after NGC is merged
+TEST(TCP_connection, NullTest)
+{
+    (void)tcp_connections_count(nullptr);

comment_data.body:
Don't pass any arguments.

`18:58 <@iphy> TEST(Foo, Bar) { (void)tcp_thing_oob_whatever; }`

I meant that missing `()`.
